items.title: “We need to acknowledge Karenga’s full story, but it...
items.content_html:
Black Lives Matter 5280

“We need to acknowledge Karenga’s full story, but it shouldn’t tarnish the value and beauty of the holiday that promotes collective action for the collective good.”

Thank you for sharing this op-ed, Amy!

I discovered Kwanzaa while attending Pomona College.

latimes.com

Op-Ed: The dark side of Kwanzaa's founder can't extinguish the holiday's beacon

items.title: Good morning, beautiful people, and happy Kwanzaa! Today is the...
items.content_html:
Black Lives Matter 5280

Good morning, beautiful people, and happy Kwanzaa!
Today is the second day, so we are acknowledging the principle KUJICHAGULIA, which means SELF-DETERMINATION. Who are you? Who do you strive to be?

items.title: #TigrayGenocide Day 55 and the Ethiopian Government refuses to...
items.content_html:
Black Lives Matter 5280

#TigrayGenocide Day 55 and the Ethiopian Government refuses to stop the genocide on Tigray. Please help us sound the alarms.

1. There are more than 15 reported massacres. We need a neutral delegation to investigate and stop the killings.

2. More than 53,000 refugees are in Sudan who are reporting horrendous acts by invading forces. We need to hear their stories and act.

...

3. The evidence shows Eritrea has been involved from day one and is now looting, killing, burning crops and homes of Tigrayans. We need Eritrea to be forcibly removed from the state.

4. We need all services restored to Tigray, including all communications opened, electricity restored.

5. We need a humanitarian corridor opened immediately! The people of Tigray are starving. They have no food, fuel, medicine.

See More

MON, DEC 28 AT 12:00 PM MST

Stop The Genocide In Tigray

601 N Lincoln St, Denver, CO 80203, United States60 people interested

items.title: “Of the 21,863 students entering medical school in 2019, only...
items.content_html:
Black Lives Matter 5280

“Of the 21,863 students entering medical school in 2019, only 1,626 were Black — and only 619 were Black males,” Montgomery Rice said in a statement. “This statistic is alarming for many reasons, not the least of which is the impact of patient care. Studies show that Black patients have better outcomes when treated by Black doctors.”

www.ajc.com/…/…/QYKYWAZYKRD6HLWOJGBLOGVVKM/%3foutputType=amp

Morehouse School of Medicine is teaming up with CommonSpirit Health in a 10-year, $100 million partnership to train more Black physicians and work toward health equity for underserved communities.

ajc.com

Morehouse School of Medicine enters $100M partnership to train more Black doctors

Morehouse School of Medicine is teaming up with CommonSpirit Health in a 10-year, $100 million partnership to train more Black physicians and work toward health equity for underserved communities.Morehouse School of Medicine is teaming up with CommonSpirit Health in a 10-year, $100 million partnership to train more Black physicians and work toward health equity for underserved communities.

items.title: Good morning, beautiful people! Today is the first day of...
items.content_html:
Black Lives Matter 5280

Good morning, beautiful people!
Today is the first day of Kwanzaa. Kwanzaa is a holiday when Black folks celebrate their vast and rich heritage and culture by acknowledging the seven principles of Nguzo Saba. Although these principles are observed all year long in our communities and families, one principle is recognized each day from December 26th to January 1st by lighting a candle on the kinara (a special Kwanzaa candleholder).
The first principle of Kwanzaa is UMOJA, which means UNITY.

items.title: ““I swear to God I know I look like that crazy woman who is...
items.content_html:
Black Lives Matter 5280

““I swear to God I know I look like that crazy woman who is screaming about this terrible dream and everybody’s like ‘What is wrong with her?’ I feel like I’m in a psych ward yelling, but nobody can hear me.”

Birhanemaskel’s head is 8,000 miles away at the refugee camp in Sudan where she was born after her parents fled bombing of their native Tigray in northern Ethiopia under a military dictatorship.”

Please help to amplify this story!!! #ApplyPressure! #WeStandWithTigray!

...

Millete, we stand with you.

See MoreMillete Birhanemaskel, a refugee, long-time Denver resident and businesswoman, grappled with 2020 as many others have: She tried to protect her family, her employees, her tenants from COVID’s reach. She worried about the presidential election. And she managed to keep her coffee shop, the Whittier ...

items.title: “The current conversation regarding re-opening school is all...
items.content_html:
Black Lives Matter 5280

“The current conversation regarding re-opening school is all about how closed schools are hurting the most vulnerable students—Black students, Latinx students, English Language Learners, poor students, and students with disabilities. But, in truth the parents clamoring the most about opening schools are the parents of the most privileged children.”

☕️

It’s been a while since I’ve written a blog. The Corona Virus has forced me to address so many things virtually, that the last thing I’ve had the energy for was sitting down in front of the compute…

blackandsmart.wordpress.com

Stop Using Black Children as an Excuse to Open Your Schools

items.title: This news is dope! One of our missions for the past few years...
items.content_html:
Black Lives Matter 5280

This news is dope! One of our missions for the past few years has been the #CounselorsNotCops initiative, so we are ecstatic to see it coming to fruition in Denver. Our children deserve better, & we’ll never stop fighting until every last cop is removed from schools and replaced with adequate and effective counseling services. ✊🏽 #NothingToLoseButOurChains

The move represents a 25% reduction in the number of school resource officers and is in line with a directive to eliminate all such officers by the end of the school year.

co.chalkbeat.org

Denver begins phasing police out of schools by eliminating 3 officer positions

The move represents a 25% reduction in the number of school resource officers and is in line with a directive to eliminate all such officers by the end of the school year.The move represents a 25% reduction in the number of school resource officers and is in line with a directive to eliminate all such officers by the end of the school year.

items.title: We have Denver & Aurora family trapped in a war zone. Be...
items.content_html:
Black Lives Matter 5280

We have Denver & Aurora family trapped in a war zone. Be relentless in asking your elected representatives what they are doing to bring them home! #NoWarInTigray #Tigray #TigrayGenocide

Millete Birhanemaskel is with Alula Solomon and 7 others.

Foreign citizens of Tigrayan background are being blocked from boarding planes and have no options to leave an active war zone. We heard a firsthand account of ...young women who were denied food, water and were stopped from boarding a plane meant for foreign citizens.

Bazen is a child who lives in Aurora. He has type 1 diabetes and there is NO medicine in Mekelle because of looting!

Share with your representatives. Be relentless. This is urgent!

#TigrayGenocide

See More

items.title: #CALLTOACTION We are infuriated. In the midst of an uprising of global proportions fueled by the worldwide demanding of...
items.content_html:
#CALLTOACTION We are infuriated. In the midst of an uprising of global proportions fueled by the worldwide demanding of #justiceforBlacklives, the justice system is still being weaponized against us in real time. With the entire world hyper-focused on racial injustice white supremacists have doubled down in full confidence that they will be protected by the justice department above all else. Boulder DA's Office, 20th Judicial District - DA Michael Dougherty is functioning as a vehicle of white supremacy in his refusal to drop these trumped up charges against this sister after years of enduring vile behaviors like the use of racial slurs against her children. We are in fierce support of Mrs. Jeweldine Kastman and her family, and we demand a full dismissal of all charges against them. Call Da Dougherty’s office and demand he dismiss this case today and everyday until it is done! (720) 470-7871
Boulder County case number 19CR1876
#DefundPolice #DefendBlackLife #AbolishthePolice #AbolitionNOW #BlackLivesMatter #BLM5280 #solidarity
Boulder DA's Office, 20th Judicial District - DA Michael Dougherty

[Image Description: BLM5280 letterhead featuring the BLM5280 skyline logo on a white background with a deep grey border reading the following:
November 11 2020
We, the members of Black Lives Matter 5280, after careful consideration of Mrs. Jeweldine Kastman’s case, believe she has been the victim of prejudice in the criminal justice system. Our core values demand we take personal responsibility for denouncing the kind of discrimination, harassment, and racism Mrs. Kastman has experienced in Boulder County. Further, we believe the District Attorney has a responsibility to the public to reexamine her case through an unbiased lens. We believe that acknowledgment and reconsideration of the implicit biases in this case should lead to the conclusion that the interests of justice require that Mrs. Kastman's case be dismissed.
Mrs. Kastman moved to Colorado just a couple of years ago having never experienced the kind of blatant racism she would encounter from her neighbors here. cont. in comments]

items.title: Many have asked about where to donate. We have shared and will...
items.content_html:
Black Lives Matter 5280

Many have asked about where to donate. We have shared and will continue to share links to bail/legal support fundraising in Denver, Minneapolis and beyond. We encourage friends to donate to BLM5280’s Emergency Fund using Venmo http://venmo.com/BLM5280 . These donations will be used for bail, legal support, and provision of direct services for Black people impacted by the current and ongoing crisis. If you would like to make a tax-deductible donation that we will have access to at a later date, you can visit our Colorado Gives Day Page to donate through our fiscal sponsor, Rocky Mountain Peace and Justice Center.

Working with residents and organizations in Denver, Black Lives Matter 5280 assists in building more loving and united Black communities while eliminating anti-Black violence and racism. To expose, address and eradicate structures and systems of oppression in Denver, BLM5280 uses a holistic racial j...
